description_carte: Taurus, imprisoned in corrupted earth, embodies stubbornness and impenetrable defense. Its hide is living stone.
description_visuelle: A colossal bull made of dark, jagged obsidian. Metallic veins pulse beneath its rocky hide. Its eyes are deep pits of shadow.

skills.name: Earth Shatter
skills.description: Taurus slams the ground, creating a shockwave that damages and stuns nearby enemies.

skills.name: Ironclad Stance
skills.description: Taurus hardens his rocky hide, greatly increasing his defense for a short duration.

skills.name: Obsidian Charge
skills.description: Taurus charges forward, dealing damage and knocking back the target.

skills.name: Living Bulwark
skills.description: Taurus uses his immense defenses to protect an ally, absorbing a portion of the damage they take.
